description: Retrieves an Amazon GuardDuty detector specified by the detectorId.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Retrieving a GuardDuty detector provides information about the security monitoring and configurations in the AWS environment.
By accessing the detector, an attacker might infer information about trusted domains and relationships within the AWS environment.
Accessing the GuardDuty detector can give insights into the cloud infrastructure setup and the security measures in place.

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetDetector to identify active threat detection systems in AWS GuardDuty.
